text: The following is a list of mayors of the city of Campo Grande, in the state of Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil. * Francisco Mestre, 1899–1904 * , 1904–1909 * João Carlos Sebastião, 1909 * José Santiago, 1909–1910, 1912–1914 * Antônio Norberto de Almeida, 1910–1911, 1919–1920 * João Clímaco Vidal, 1915 * Sebastião da Costa Lima, 1915–1917 * Fernando Novais, 1917 * Leonel Velasco, 1918 * ,
